title: I can't open some of my apps. They just refuse to open.
content: I'm trying to get my apps to stop crashing. I've tried wiping cache, force stopping, restarting, shutting down, and wiping data of the app. The wiping data worked the first time, BUT, when I reopen the app, it starts crashing again! I'm having this problem with discord, gmail, and the Google keyboard in the home screen. What should I do?
